name: Skully Skirmish
description:
Obliterate The Enemy Scum!  

This island is not big enough for both of you and the residents aren't particularly friendly. Not to worry, assistance is on the way, with airdrops containing weapons and other goodies being sent in to support you. Blast your way to victory by utterly exterminating the undead population before they recruit you as the newest member of their team.

CONTROLS
  • WASD: Move
  • Mouse: Aim
  • Mouse Right-Click: fire
PICKUPS
  • Revolver: Single shot
  • Shotgun: Single shot
  • Uzi: Weapon: burst
  • Tommygun: Automatic 
  • Grenade Launchers: Single shot
  • Bazooka: Single shot
  • Lazer Gun: Single shot
  • Chicken Leg: Health
  • Force Field: Shield

Sounds and music: 

https://freesfx.co.uk/
